feed.title: 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼
feed.subtitle: a new take on content from the bulltown archives, circa 1998-2004

entry.title: scenes in a window
my little WebNeko wins again
entry.content: My finicky friend WebNeko (up there in the left corner) doesn’t always play well with other scripts. At the b22 site, I actually had rebuilt the music section to bring little neko back. Now, here on the neo site, I did away with the Zonelets script, not because I didn’t like it, but because I was able to bring my little buddy back. Yay!
entry.summary: My finicky friend WebNeko (up there in the left corner) doesn’t always play well with other scripts. At the b22 site, I actually had rebuilt the music section to bring little neko back. Now, here on the neo site, I did away with the Zonelets script, not because I didn’t like it, but because I was able to bring my little buddy back. Yay!

entry.title: thanks!
entry.content:
In the short time since I joined Neocities, the feedback I’ve received from the community has been inspiring. To all of you following bulltown and those who have given me feedback, I’ve got something to say:

Thanks for making me feel welcome - I love this place!
entry.summary: In the short time since I joined Neocities, the feedback I’ve received from the community has been inspiring. To all of you following bulltown and those who have given me feedback, I’ve got something to say: Thanks for making me feel welcome - I love this place!

entry.title: site news 09-30-24
entry.content:
Just a quick note to let you know I’ve been working on improving how the button walls render on mobile. Though most of the work is being done offline, both 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟮 and 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼 may occasionally look a little funky as the project continues. Thx.

Update 10/02/24: Now that mobile’s looking good, some other changes are underway - please stay tuned... 😎
entry.summary: Just a quick note to let you know I’ve been working on improving how the button walls render on mobile. Though most of the work is being done offline, both 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟮 and 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼 may occasionally look a little funky as the project continues. Thx. Update 10/02/24: Now that mobile’s looking good, some other changes are underway - please stay tuned... 😎

entry.title: freedom
entry.content:
people need freedom
gotta express their real selves
to mean anything

entry.title: 7 Days and counting
entry.content:
𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼 is 7 days old today. It’s also my birthday but I stopped counting a long time ago. 😎

The original 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻 goes back some 25 years and was revived in 2022. Versions 3 and 4 are still online, one of which evolved into my current simply. blog.

As the saying goes, this ain’t my first rodeo. I love the web!

Thank you Neocities community - I appreciate those following 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼 and created a little section with your linked buttons on the main page (also at 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟮).

Make it a great day and thanks for stopping by…

Versions 3 and 4 are still online, one of which evolved into my current simply. blog. As the saying goes, this ain’t my first rodeo. I love the web! Thank you Neocities community - I appreciate those following 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝗻𝗲𝗼 and created a little section with your linked buttons on the main page (also at 𝗯𝘂𝗹𝗹𝘁𝗼𝘄𝗻.𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟮). Make it a great day and thanks for stopping by…
